dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 is a labeled subset of a set of 80 million natural images for object recognition, composed of 60,000 color images from 100 classes with 500 images for training and 100 images for testing. All images are set to the size of 32 × 32.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Jia Deng
Wei Dong
Richard Socher
Li-Jia Li
Kai Li
Li Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: Mini-ImageNet is a subset of ImageNet, including 100 classes. Each class is split into 500 training and 100 test samples with the size of 224 × 224.
dcterms:title: Mini-ImageNet

dcterms:creator: Ya Le
Xuan Yang
dcterms:description: Tiny-ImageNet is a subset of ImageNet according to the semantic hierarchy, which has 200 classes, each with 500 training images, 50 validation images, and 50 testing images. All images are resized to 64 × 64.
dcterms:title: Tiny-ImageNet
